procedure-definition.name: User Accounts Creation Use Active Directory
Create Batch Fees
procedure-definition.description: This procedure creates Student Fee records en masse based upon membership/enrollment to Groups or School Courses that have a Fee Type assigned. The procedure will only create a Student Fee record to persons who have not already been assessed a fee within that Group or School Course. If the appropriate Fee Type has a Frequency associated to it, the procedure will assess the fee accordingly.

procedure-definition.name: Resolve Dropped Fees
procedure-definition.description: This procedure provides an option to either delete or void student fee records created by the “Create Batch Fees” procedure. If the Student Fee record has been partially or fully paid, but the student is no longer enrolled in the course or is no longer a member of the group, a user defined field on the Student Fee record will be set so that a user can identify and manage the record accordingly.

procedure-definition.name: Process Future Schedule Changes
procedure-definition.description: This procedure processes pending future schedule change records by effective date.

procedure-definition.name: Process Future Transfer Records
procedure-definition.description: This procedure processes future transfer records by student transfer enrollment date.

procedure-definition.name: Prepopulate Rubric Scores
procedure-definition.description: Allows for the copying of posted rubric grades from one term into the post columns of another term. If grades are already present in the destination they will not be overwritten.

procedure-definition.name: Overall Average
procedure-definition.description: This procedure calculates the average (arithmetic mean) of the term grades.

procedure-definition.name: Cumulative Average
procedure-definition.description: This procedure calculates the average of all assignment scores entered since the beginning of the class, regardless of term. It is calculated using the average mode specified in your gradebook.

procedure-definition.name: Semester Running Average
procedure-definition.description: This procedure calculates all assignment scores entered during the grade terms of the given semester. It is calculated using the average mode specified in your gradebook. Aspen will append the semester number to the column header.

procedure-definition.name: Standard Overall Average
procedure-definition.description: This procedure calculates the average (arithmetic mean) of all scores entered for a reporting standard.

procedure-definition.name: Overall Standards Average using Trends
procedure-definition.description: This procedure calculates the overall average of all standards trend averages for the term.

procedure-definition.name: Overall Standards Average using Averages
procedure-definition.description: This procedure calculates the overall average of all standards averages for the term.

procedure-definition.name: Standard Trend Average
procedure-definition.description: This procedure calculates the trend of all scores entered within a grade term for a reporting standard.

procedure-definition.name: Standard Trend Cumulative Average
procedure-definition.description: This procedure calculates the cumulative trend of all scores entered for a reporting standard.

procedure-definition.name: Bulk Exit Students from Special Education
procedure-definition.description:
You are about to bulk exit {currentList.numberOfRecords} students on the current list from Special Education.

This procedure, which bulk exits students who have been un-enrolled from their school but not yet withdrawn from Special Eduction, is intended to be used in conjunction with the filter, "Active - Inactive Enrollment" to identify the appropriate students for exit. Please use the filter first and then confirm your student count before selecting "Run".

report-definition.name: Customizations Fonts JAR List by Language
report-definition.description:
• Server Install Instructions
  • Supported Languages

ASPEN | Customizations Fonts Server Instructions

Deploy this JAR into Tomcats lib directory.
Each font license is inside of it's own directory.
iReport won't render automatically bold or italic fonts on PDFs, you need to specify them by name,
these styles have been added when possible: Regular, Bold, Italic and BoldItalic. Some additional
styles are included inside each folder when found.

<<< Hide Description

ASPEN | Customizations Fonts Index

The following languages are included:

*****************
* LEFT TO RIGHT *
*****************
AMHARIC --> NotoSansEthiopic
NotoSansEthiopic-Bold.ttf
NotoSansEthiopic-Regular.ttf

Chinese
ZCOOLQingKeHuangYou-Regular.ttf

GREEK --> Opens_Sans
OpenSans-Bold.ttf
OpenSans-BoldItalic.ttf
OpenSans-Italic.ttf
OpenSans-Regular.ttf

GUJARATI ---> Hind_Vadodara
HindVadodara-Bold.ttf
HindVadodara-Regular.ttf

JAPANESE --> MPLUS1p
MPLUS1p-Bold.ttf
MPLUS1p-Regular.ttf
MPLUS1p-Thin.ttf

KANNADA --> Baloo_Tamma
BalooTamma-Regular.ttf

KOREAN ---> Song_Myung
SongMyung-Regular.ttf

TAGALOG ---> Open_Sans (see Greek)

TAMIL ---> Arima_Madurai
ArimaMadurai-Bold.ttf
ArimaMadurai-Regular.ttf

TELUGU ---> Suranna
Suranna-Regular.ttf

THAI ---> Itim
Itim-Regular.ttf

VIETNAMESE --> Opens_Sans (see Greek)
NotoSans-Bold.ttf
NotoSans-BoldItalic.ttf
NotoSans-Italic.ttf
NotoSans-Regular.ttf

*****************
* RIGHT TO LEFT *
*****************
ARABIC ---> Amiri
NotoNaskhArabic-Bold.ttf
NotoNaskhArabic-Regular.ttf

HEBREW ---> Tinos
Tinos-Bold.ttf
Tinos-BoldItalic.ttf
Tinos-Italic.ttf
Tinos-Regular.ttf

URDU ---> Amiri (could also use fonts under Arabic)
Amiri-Bold.ttf
Amiri-Regular.ttf
Amiri-Italic.ttf
Amiri-BoldItalic.ttf
NotoNastaliqUrdu-Regular.ttf

***********************************************
* MULTI LINGUAL FONTS - DEVAVU MONO AND SERIF *
***********************************************
In order to simplify use and maintenance we have included:
DejaVuSansMono.ttf
DejaVuSerif.ttf

These fonts support the following languages:
Afrikaans Archaic Greek Letters Armenian Baltic Basic Cyrillic Basic Greek Basic Latin Catalan Central European Claudian Letters Dutch Esperanto Euro Georgian Igbo Onwu IPA Latin Ligatures Pinyin Polytonic Greek Romanian Turkish Vietnamese Western European
